sections.heading: rule; superseded.The Uniform Statutory Rule Against Perpetuities Act supersedes the rule of common law known as the rule against perpetuities

sections.text:
76-2008.Common-law rule; superseded.

The Uniform Statutory Rule Against Perpetuities Act supersedes the rule of common law known as the rule against perpetuities.

SourceLaws 1989, LB 377, ยง 8.
